Title: To Be a Master
Description: There will come a day when you have mastered all that we have to teach you. When that day comes, it will be time for you to teach others in turn. When you have proven to yourself that you have mastered all the Ways, come back and speak with me.
ObjectivesText: Make Black Pepper Steak, Sea Mist Rice Noodles, Mogu Fish Stew, Steamed Crab, Chun Tian Spring Roll and Mad Brewer's Breakfast, then return to the Guide to the Ways.

Objectives.Text: Cook Black Pepper Ribs and Shrimp
